attributes.action: Adopt a policy similar to the Chinese to enforce cyclists to display number plates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cyclists are not only road users they cycle on pavements knocking into pedestrians.  All cycles should be issued with number plates by the DVLA and pay a registration fee of say £20 per year.  The revenue should be used to help compensate the unfortunate pedestrians who have been injured by hit and run cyclists.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
